elements.name: When invalid authorization information and a PATCH body containing the 'id' are sent
elements.description:
to the 'api/withdraw/methods/status/{{id}}' endpoint, it should be verified that the returned status
  code is 401, and the error information in the response body is "Unauthorized request"

steps.name: The API user sets "api/withdraw/methods/status/23" path parameters

The API user records the response from the api withdraw methods status endpoint with invalid authorization information verifies that the status code is '401' and confirms that the error message is Unauthorized

name: As an administrator, I want to be able to update the status information of registered withdrawal methods through the API connection.
